page.title: 17Major General Bredin.
page.content: { Major General Bredin M.C. D.S.O} born in Pakistan at the southern end of the Kyber Pass in 1916. { He went to Kings, Canterbury,}the oldest school in England.He liked sports,games and history. After school he went to Sandhurst. They had drill and physical training and they were very strict. { After Sandhurst}and before the war he went to{Palestine}where there was a Rebellion by the Jews and the Arabs and the British were trying to keep the peace.In the second world war he fought in{Palestine, N.Africa, {Sicily, Italy{and Austria.}Later he fought in{Malaya, Sudan ,Cyprus and } {Kenya. } { Now}he is{President}of the{Dunkirk } {Veteran Association, Fund raising {Organiser}for{Cancer Research}and {Deputy Lieutenant of Essex. }
